Subscription.Description: Registry modification audit events (created, modified, deleted)
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Inspired by Microsoft Documentation and/or IADGOV --> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- Registry modified events for Operations: New Registry Value created (%%1904), Existing Registry Value modified (%%1905), Registry Value Deleted (%%1906) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4657)]] and ((*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1904"]]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1905"]]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1906"]]))</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
